text: 4 MVCC HISTORY Protocol was first proposed in 1978 MIT PhD dissertation. First implementations was Rdb/VMS and InterBase at DEC in early 1980s. — Both were by Jim Starkey, co-founder of NuoDB. — DEC Rdb/VMS is now "Oracle Rdb" —> InterBase was open-sourced as Firebird. ! pc Vs m rs i pj 4 3:22/7:09:33 - MultiVersion Control > e o — O CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
